page.title: 02EDUCATION SHILLINGSTONE
page.content: There are three Local Authority schools in the area:Shillingstone,Okeford Fitzpaine and Child Okeford Primary Schools taking children aged between 4.5 and 11+ years of age.After this age the children move on to the High School at Sturminster Newton,leaving there at 16+.Further education is in Gillingham Blandford or the Poole/Bournemouth area. There is also an Independent School in Shillingstone,Croft House School for Girls. This school takes in both day and boarding pupils,and provides a considerable source of employment for the women of the village. A number of children attend Public Schools in the adjacent areas.
